# Vlog Mode

When the mode dial is rotated to **Vlog**, the shutter button can be used to record movies at settings appropriate for vlogs (video blogs). Settings can be adjusted using touch controls.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Settings for **Vlog** mode are stored separately from those used when movies are recorded in !Movie Mode Icon mode or via the !Movie Button Icon (movie) button.

1. **Rotate the mode dial to Vlog.**

   !Mode Dial to Vlog

   **Vlog** will appear in the display.

   !Vlog Display

To view shooting settings, tap the **Vlog** button.

- Tap !Return Icon to return to the shooting display.
- To exit to full-frame playback, tap !Playback Icon (see page 64).

> ðŸ’¡ **Tips:**
> - Selecting **ON** for **BACKGROUND DEFOCUS MODE** fixes aperture at the widest value for the lens.
> - To maintain focus on an object in the foreground, as for example when filming a product review, select **ON** for **PRODUCT PRIORITY MODE**.
